parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.query:
managedservicesresources
| where type == "microsoft.managedservices/registrationassignments"
| where properties.provisioningState == "Succeeded"
| extend ManageeTenantName = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.manageeTenantName
| extend ManageeTenantId = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.manageeTenantId
| extend ManagedByTenantName = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.managedByTenantName
| extend ManagedByTenantId = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.managedByTenantId
| extend PermanentAccess = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.authorizations
| extend JITAccess = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.eligibleAuthorizations
| extend AddedDate = properties.registrationDefinition.systemData.createdAt
| extend CreatedBy = systemData.createdBy
| project ManageeTenantName, ManageeTenantId, ManagedByTenantName, ManagedByTenantId, AddedDate, CreatedBy
content.title: Azure Lighthouse Delegations

content.json:
# [IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-sentinel-blog/defending-critical-infrastructure-with-the-microsoft-sentinel-it/ba-p/3061184)
---

Welcome to the IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT Workbook. 
This workbook provides a guided investigation for entities based on open incidents, alerts sign-ins and activity for IT/OT assets. This workbook also provides hunting via MITRE ATT&CK¬Æ for ICS, and designed to enable SecOps Analysts, Security Engineers, and MSSPs to gain situational awareness for IT/OT security posture.

links.linkLabel: Get Started with Microsoft Defender for IoT

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: HIGH

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where AlertSeverity == "Medium"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: MEDIUM

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| where AlertSeverity == "Low"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: LOW

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where dayofyear(TimeGenerated) == dayofyear(now())
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: NEW TODAY

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| summarize count() by AlertName
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: TOP MOST ALERTS

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by AlertName
| render timechart
content.title: TRENDING

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| summarize kwSum=count() by ProductComponentName
| sort by kwSum desc
content.title: ‚¨áÔ∏è SELECTOR

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where tostring(sensorengine_) has ProductComponentName or isempty(sensorengine_)
| summarize kwSum=count() by AlertSeverity
| sort by AlertSeverity asc
content.title: SEVERITY
TRENDING

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" 
| extend Category_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Category)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SensorId)
| extend Address_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Address)
| extend Type1_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceId)
| extend Type2_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IoTHub)).Type)
| extend Type3_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceType_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend Vendor_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| where SensorId_ <> ""
| summarize count() by SensorId_
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: SENSOR

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" 
| extend Category_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Category)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SensorId)
| extend Address_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Address)
| extend Type1_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceId)
| extend Type2_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IoTHub)).Type)
| extend Type3_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceType_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend Vendor_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| where DeviceType_ <> ""
| summarize count() by DeviceType_
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: DEVICE_TYPE

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT"

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" 
| extend Category_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Category)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SensorId)
| extend Address_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Address)
| extend Type1_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceId)
| extend Type2_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IoTHub)).Type)
| extend Type3_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceType_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend Vendor_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| where CompromisedEntity <> ""
| summarize count() by CompromisedEntity
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Entities

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| distinct AlertName, AlertSeverity, ProductName, Status, Tactics, AlertLink, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| limit 250
content.title: üü¶ Security Alerts: Go To >

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where Severity == "High"
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where Severity == "High"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: HIGH

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "Active"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: ACTIVE

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "Closed"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: CLOSED
content.noDataMessage: No unauthorized devices making config changes

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where Severity == "High"
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New"
| where dayofyear(TimeGenerated) == dayofyear(now())
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: NEW TODAY
content.noDataMessage: No unauthorized devices making config changes

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where Severity == "High"
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| summarize count() by Title
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: TOP MOST INCIDENTS

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where Severity == "High"
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by Title
| render timechart
content.title: TRENDING

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| summarize count() by Severity
| render piechart
content.title: SEVERITY

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == 'Closed'
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| extend feedback =strcat(Classification," ",ClassificationReason)
| summarize dcount(IncidentNumber) by feedback
content.title: CLOSE CODES

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToTriage =  (FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToTriage, 50)
content.title: MEAN TIME TO RESPOND

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToResolve =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1d
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToResolve, 50)
content.title: MEAN TIME TO RESOLVE

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| extend IPAddress = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IpAddress)).Address)
| where CompromisedEntity <> ""
| summarize count() by CompromisedEntity
| where CompromisedEntity has "."
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: IP ADDRESS

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Protocol)
| summarize count() by Protocol
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: PROTOCOL

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| extend DeviceName = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceName)
| where DeviceName <> ""
| summarize count() by DeviceName
| where DeviceName !contains "."
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: DEVICE TYPE

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| extend Vendor = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| where Vendor <> ""
| summarize count() by Vendor
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: VENDOR

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, ProductName, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.noDataMessage: No Incidents Observed Within These Thresholds

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Tactics contains "Initial"
| summarize count()
| extend Link = strcat("https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Initial_Access")

SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Tactics contains "Execution"
| summarize count()
| extend Link = strcat("https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Execution")

SecurityIncident

| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Tactics contains "Persistence"

SecurityIncident

SecurityIncident

| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])

| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AdditionalData contains "T0871"
| summarize count()
| extend Link = strcat("https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Technique/T0871")

SecurityAlert
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| extend DeviceName = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceName)
| extend DeviceType = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend IPAddress = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IpAddress)).Address)
| extend MacAddress = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].MacAddress)
| extend Model = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Model)
| extend OperatingSystem = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].OperatingSystem)
| extend Protocol = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Protocols))[0])
| extend SerialNumber = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].SerialNumber)
| extend Vendor = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| extend Type = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| where IPAddress <> ""
| distinct DeviceName, Type, DeviceType, IPAddress, MacAddress, Model, OperatingSystem, Protocol, SerialNumber, Vendor
| sort by DeviceName asc
content.title: üü¶ OT Asset Inventory
